t: A Prayer for Divine Scrutiny and Redemption
Vindicate*pn me, O Lord,*s For*ld I have walked in my integrity. I*ld have also trusted in the Lord;*s I*ld shall not slip.
Examine*ld me, O Lord,*s and prove me; Try*ld my mind and my heart.
For*ld Your lovingkindness is*i before my eyes, And*ld I have walked in Your truth.
I*ld have not sat with idolatrous mortals, Nor*ld will I go in with hypocrites.
I*ld have hated the assembly of evildoers, And*ld will not sit with the wicked.
I*ln will wash my hands in innocence; So*ld I will go about Your altar, O Lord,*s
That*ld I may proclaim with the voice of thanksgiving, And*ld tell of all Your wondrous works.
Lord,*sld I have loved the habitation of Your house, And*ld the place where Your glory dwells.
Do*ln not gather my soul with sinners, Nor*ld my life with bloodthirsty men,
In*ld whose hands is*i a sinister scheme, And*ld whose right hand is full of bribes.
But*ln as for me, I will walk in my integrity; Redeem*ld me and be merciful to me.
My*ld foot stands in an even place; In*ld the congregations I will bless the Lord.*s
